protein.specific_function: Mediates the uptake of a broad range of neutral and cationic amino acids (with the exception of proline) in a Na(+)/Cl(-)-dependent manner

reference.reference_text: Sloan JL, Mager S: Cloning and functional expression of a human Na(+) and Cl(-)-dependent neutral and cationic amino acid transporter B(0+). J Biol Chem. 1999 Aug 20;274(34):23740-5.
